infos.title: Wizard of Ice Dragon
infos.story: A curious case of a human wizard possessed by the soul of an ice dragon. Having fought alongside Kyle 100 years ago, this ancient ice wizard has actually existed far before even then. The dragon's soul is usually asleep, but wakes up occasionally to speak to him in the voice of a lover. The empire considers him a key figure, and has dispatched Rodina to monitor and protect him. He himself, however, only wishes to live in peace and quiet, away from the concerns of the world.

uw.name: Andarta Andraste, Dragon's Heart
uw.description: Every (0) sec, deals (1) of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze the enemy for 5 sec.
uw.story: Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the Demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.

1.story: A snow crystal in an ancient form, and a home of the winter elementals. Its beauty imprisons weak minds in an eternal blizzard. Dragons Andarta and Andraste gave this to Pavel after he made their wish come true. It also consoled his lonely heart during his solitary stay in Windland until Rodina came along.

2.story: The dragon of ice gifted this brooch to a young Pavel, and imbued it with its breath. But after the dragon of ice and Pavel became one, it reminds Pavel to not leave him. It can inflict pain that pierces the heart. Imbues a chill to Pavel's mana, making his magic even sharper.

4.name: Ice Dragon's Heart

4.story: A present that a possessed female Dragon gave to Pavel. The Ice Dragon always gave him all kinds of gifts, whether Pavel liked it or not. This orb was one of them, and it has a little part of her soul imbued in it.

sw.story:
An ominous wave of mana stroked the dragon's heart.

Lewisia had told Pavel about the situation in Orvel, and how Kasel turned into a dark lord. Pavel let out his rage onto the cruel reality, and his freezing fury fiercely permeated throughout the air.
The strong vibration of the soul was powerful enough to break the barrier containing immense mana to ensure comfortable rest to the two dragons.

Ultimately, Andarta and Andraste resonated with Pavel's freezing fury, and appeared with their gigantic wings.
